headline: How the Story Around First Solar Is Shifting After Policy and Analyst Upgrades
summary: First Solar's stock has recently seen its consensus analyst price target climb from $224 to approximately $239, marking a modest upward revision in its estimated fair value. This shift reflects renewed optimism among analysts in light of the company's strong U.S.-based manufacturing presence and continued success in securing new contracts. Stay tuned to discover how ongoing developments could further shape the narrative and how you can keep track of these evolving perspectives going...
